Author: NNoperator#3835
Content: If it sees Y or y there is  conditional formatting to turn green.  It is really cool to simultaneously edit a document.  I'll never get over that thrill, after working with documents (at Apple with 200 other people) that I had to lock prior to editing (and 10% of the editors would forget to lock and ruin your edits)
